overview: Lucy Heart - Lucy is pleased to show off her new lingerie for Max. Once she has both stockings on and has attached the tops to the garter belt, Lucy inspects herself in the mirror. Satisfied with what she sees, she collapses on the couch to make out with Max. Viviana - Viviana dresses in a silky slip that leaves very little to the imagination and smiles as Mugur lets his camera love her body. Stripping slowly for the camera, Viviana teases with peeks at her breasts and a good long look at her ass in its thong.
tagline: He only has it because she lets him.
title: Control
